lead_paragraph: Michael Phelps and Ryan Lochte cruised to victory in their respective 200 meters medley semi-finals at the U.S. Olympic trials on Thursday to set up one last mouth-watering showdown between the rivals on home soil.

headline.main: Phelps and Rival Lochte Set for 200m Medley Showdown
headline.print_headline: Phelps and Rival Lochte Set for 200m Medley Showdown

snippet: Michael Phelps and Ryan Lochte cruised to victory in their respective 200 meters medley semi-finals at the U.S. Olympic trials on Thursday to set up one last mouth-watering showdown between the rivals on home soil....
